description: This course, based on the 2014 CompTIA objectives, helps existing and prospective IT professionals develop mastery of the knowledge and skills required to conceptualize, design and implement security solutions at the enterprise level. Learn to implement best practices in a changing business environment, safeguard data safety in cloud-based applications, and find the research resources you need to be up to date on the latest threats and technologies. CASP certified IT professionals are equipped to offer the most advanced security solutions worldwide. Individuals who successfully complete this course will have the knowledge necessary to meet the requirements of the CompTIA Advanced Security Practitioner CAS-002 certification exam.
title: CompTIA Advanced Security Practitioner: CAS-002
